h3.div:
April 16, 6:15 pm
New Update! Google Meet is now available directly inside Google Classroom!

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Quickly turn on this setting in Google Classroom and every class you have will have there own Google Meet link. Make the link visible or hidden in Google Classroom control entry into your Google Meet.

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: We're offering

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: to teachers through May 1, 2020. You can take advantage of this offer by clicking

span.style: font-family: Bitter; text-decoration: underline;
font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: . This offer is not available for current Educreations Pro subscribers.

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Education institutions can get free access to Kahoot! Premium to empower distance and online learning and engage students anywhere, anytime.

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

a.strong: Click here to get access to Premium for schools or higher education

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

h3.div:
March 30, 5:16 pm
Get Free BrainPOP Access

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Use BrainPOP as part of your distance learning plans and keep your students engaged and on-track. This

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: will get you and your class immediate access to BrainPOP products including BrainPOP Jr., ELL, Franais and Espaol.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
span.a: Free BrainPOP Access for Schools Affected by the Coronavirus

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

h3.div:
March 23, 10:11 am
Get Epic at home access.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Bitter;
font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: offering FREE worldwide Remote Student Access to Epic through the end of the school year (June 30th, 2020), by teacher invitation no credit card required.

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Families only need an invitation from their teacher to get started. Students will have anywhere, anytime access to the full Epic library on all devices (including web browsers, the iOS app and the Android app), and teachers can stay connected to their students by assigning books and collections and tracking reading activity and progress.

h3.div:
March 23, 9:32 am
Read alouds online: Are they legal?

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: As educators move to remote learning, many are worrying and wondering about reading books aloud online and possibly violating copyright laws. In response, many children's publishers have temporarily altered policies. Click

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: for more details.

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px

div.br:
March 18, 1:44 pm
Screencastify videos have been slow to upload for some users. Here's their response.

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Google Drive's servers appear to be experiencing a lot of load that has increased processing time. Your videos will eventually be processed, but there does not seem to be any consistent amount of time you can expect it to take.

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: We are doing everything we possibly can get Google's attention so that they can prioritize this issue and get it fixed. We have opened up an urgent case with them and we're working with all of our contacts at Google to get it escalated even faster.

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: However, we are a very small company and could use your help it getting it solved faster. Here's what you can do:

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

a.strong: Upvote and comment on this post

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: in the Google Drive community support forum. We've found that the more interactions posts on the Community forum have, the faster Google is to prioritize them.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Ask your technology admin (if you have one) to contact your Google representative and communicate the urgency of this issue (feel free to give them our contact info too)

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: There are also a couple of things you can to make your video immediately watchable:

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Uploading to YouTube (

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: ) - you can always make your video private or unlisted

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Download videos as webM or mp4 (

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: ) to be sent to students or uploaded elsewhere

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-II5mzb jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-II5mzb jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Resources available by grade and the person to contact for support.
